description: '''Bronco''' is a Mexican [[Grupera|grupero]] band originating from [[Apodaca]], [[Nuevo León]] originally composed of band members [[José Guadalupe Esparza|José Guadalupe "Lupe" Esparza]], Ramiro Delgado, Javier Villareal, and José Luis "Choche" Villareal. As with many [[grupera]] bands, members wore band [[jumpsuit]]s.
